message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me at $110?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still not able to go above $100. Can we meet at $100?
